bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Postcard from John R. Taylor to Philip Showalter Hench, January 15, 1942

div1.p: Taylor writes that he has been delayed in sending photographs to Hench.

div1.head: Postcard from John R. Taylor to Philip Showalter Hench, January 15, 1942
div1.p:
There will be another delay
in your receiving the photographs.
When I went to register the envelope
they would not accept it, because I
had sealed it with gummed paper.
So will have to go for another
envelope. However, you will get them.
